sentences.en: A white cane sofa is sumptuously upholstered in gold taffeta and purple velvet.
sentences.cn: 白藤沙发上配有金色塔夫绸和紫色天鹅绒制成的沙发垫，显得豪华而精致。

sentences.en: A. designs and manufactures a broad collection of residential upholstered furniture.
sentences.cn: 集团设计并且生产丰富广泛的皮革家具系列产品.

sentences.en: All of their furniture was upholstered in flowery materials.
sentences.cn: 他们所有的家具都套了花面料套子。

sentences.en: All the chairs in the lounge are upholstered in black leather.
sentences.cn: 厅里所有的椅子都装上了黑皮面子.

sentences.en: An upholstered sofa or divan without arms or a back.
sentences.cn: '褥'.''榻无靠背或扶手的装垫沙发或长沙发.

sentences.en: Everything ornately upholstered, everything carefully finished, everything remarkably reserved.
sentences.cn: 一切都布置得十分华丽, 一切都安排得非常细致, 一切都显得那么矜持而高不可攀.

sentences.en: He was overweight without being fat , and referred to himself as'comfortably upholstered.'
sentences.cn: 他的体重已经超过正常标准,但并不显得肥胖, 用他自己的话说是 ” 肉长得让人舒服.

sentences.en: In the wool - carpeted master bedroom, Nicholas's walnut table accompanies Kollar's linen - upholstered headboard.
sentences.cn: 在羊毛地毯装饰的主卧室内, 尼古拉斯设计的胡桃木茶几与科勒设计的亚麻面床头板相适配.

sentences.en: My blue - green upholstered chairs that clashed with the couches lurked in corners.
sentences.cn: 我青绿色的软垫椅跟他的沙发毫不匹配,放到了不显眼的角落里.

sentences.en: Sports A piece of gymnastic equipment with an upholstered body used especially for vaulting.
sentences.cn: 体操器械,主体装有软垫,主要用于支撑跳跃.

sentences.en: The sides the seats are upholstered in light - grey fabric and the centre insets in black fabric.
sentences.cn: 在座位的两侧,装饰浅灰色和黑色的织物面料中心空白宽度.

sentences.en: There was a huge upholstered couch , some deep leather armchairs a library table heaped with magazines.
sentences.cn: 有一张很大的弹簧床, 几张高背扶手皮椅,一张书桌上堆满了杂志.

sentences.en: You can also lie in the chair by lowering the upholstered back.
sentences.cn: 列车员:您还可以把软靠背放低一点,躺在椅子上.

trans.tran_cn: 经过布置的，装软垫的，稳重的
trans.tran_en: Upholstered chairs and seats have a soft covering that makes them comfortable to sit on
